ACT
20
A vacant legacy
The testator's real estate and the rights equal to it shall pass to the municipality or city in whose territory they are located.
Movable property and rights equal to it are transferred to the municipality, that is, the city where the testator had his residence at the time of his death in the territory of the Republic of Croatia.
If the testator did not have a residence in the territory of the Republic of Croatia at the time of death, but had a place of residence, movable property and the rights equal to them pass to the municipality, or city where the testator had a place of residence in the territory of the Republic of Croatia at the time of death.
If at the time of death the testator had neither residence nor place of residence in the territory of the Republic of Croatia, the movables and the rights equal to them pass to the municipality, or city where the testator was registered in the register of citizens of the Republic of Croatia at the time of death.
